data.lyric:
[ti:Beautiful People (feat. Khalid)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Khalid]
[al:No.6 Collaborations Project]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beautiful People (feat. Khalid) - Ed Sheeran/Khalid
[00:01.06]Composed by：Ed Sheeran/Fred Gibson/Khalid Robinson/Max Martin/Shellback
[00:02.67]Ed Sheeran：
[00:02.84]We are we are we are
[00:15.90]L.A. on a Saturday night in the summer
[00:19.61]Sundown and they all come out
[00:22.20]Lamborghinis and their rented Hummers
[00:24.66]The party's on so they're headin' downtown
[00:26.72]'Round here
[00:27.38]Everybody's lookin' for a come up
[00:29.89]And they wanna know what you're about
[00:32.45]Me in the middle with the one I love and
[00:35.15]We're just tryna figure everything out
[00:37.13]We don't fit in well 'cause we are just ourselves
[00:42.35]I could use some help gettin' out of this conversation yeah
[00:47.49]You look stunning dear so don't ask that question here
[00:52.52]This is my only fear that we become
[00:56.71]Beautiful people
[00:58.04]Drop top designer clothes
[01:00.49]Front row at fashion shows
[01:02.80]"What d'you do" and "Who d'you know"
[01:05.66]Inside the world of beautiful people
[01:08.27]Champagne and rolled-up notes
[01:10.69]Prenups and broken homes
[01:13.24]Surrounded but still alone
[01:15.96]Let's leave the party
[01:17.25]That's not who we are
[01:20.23]We are we are we are
[01:22.29]We are not beautiful
[01:27.27]Yeah that's not who we are
[01:30.55]We are we are we are
[01:32.60]We are not beautiful
[01:34.97]Beautiful
[01:36.52]Khalid：
[01:38.36]L.A. mmm
[01:40.70]Drove for hours last night and we made it nowhere
[01:44.07]Nowhere nowhere
[01:45.75]I see stars in your eyes when we're halfway there
[01:49.93]All night
[01:50.99]I'm not fazed by all them lights and flashin' cameras
[01:55.81]'Cause with my arms around you there's no need to care
[01:59.68]We don't fit in well we are just ourselves
[02:04.85]I could use some help gettin' out of this conversation yeah
[02:10.05]You look stunning dear so don't ask that question here
[02:15.13]This is my only fear that we become
[02:18.56]Ed Sheeran：
[02:19.31]Beautiful people
[02:20.46]Drop top designer clothes
[02:23.10]Front row at fashion shows
[02:25.36]"What d'you do" and "Who d'you know"
[02:28.23]Inside the world of beautiful people
[02:30.89]Champagne and rolled-up notes
[02:33.35]Prenups and broken homes
[02:35.83]Surrounded but still alone
[02:38.50]Let's leave the party
[02:39.84]Both：
[02:40.13]That's not who we are
[02:42.85]We are we are we are
[02:44.97]We are not beautiful yeah
[02:49.99]Yeah that's not who we are
[02:53.12]We are we are we are
[02:55.16]We are not beautiful
[02:57.46]Beautiful
[02:59.32]Ed Sheeran：
[03:03.69]We are we are we are
[03:05.58]We are not beautiful
data.trans:
[ti:Beautiful People (feat. Khalid)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Khalid]
[al:No.6 Collaborations Project]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.06]//
[00:02.67]//
[00:02.84]我们是谁
[00:15.90]夏日炎炎 周六晚上的洛杉矶热闹非凡
[00:19.61]夜幕降临 大家走出家门 享受大好时光
[00:22.20]开着兰博基尼和租来的悍马
[00:24.66]聚会已经拉开序幕 他们向着
[00:26.72]市区进发
[00:27.38]每个人都竭尽全力地跻身上流社会
[00:29.89]他们对你充满好奇
[00:32.45]我和爱人站在熙熙攘攘的人群中
[00:35.15]我们想看清真相
[00:37.13]我们格格不入 我们只想做自己
[00:42.35]我急需帮助 想结束这场对话
[00:47.49]你的容颜震惊四座 亲爱的 别着急地质问我
[00:52.52]我只是害怕 我们会变成
[00:56.71]外表光鲜的名流 金玉其外实则败絮其中
[00:58.04]豪车云集 名牌衣服让人眼花缭乱
[01:00.49]坐在前排观看时装秀
[01:02.80]寒暄几句 你从事什么工作 你认识哪些达官显贵
[01:05.66]置身于上流社会的社交场合
[01:08.27]纸醉金迷的生活
[01:10.69]签下婚前协议 保证自己婚姻破裂时的权益
[01:13.24]身边有很多朋友 可依然感到孤独寂寞
[01:15.96]让我们离开这场聚会
[01:17.25]这不是我们的本来面目
[01:20.23]我们是谁
[01:22.29]我们只是普通人
[01:27.27]这不是我们的本来面目
[01:30.55]我们是谁
[01:32.60]我们只是普通人
[01:34.97]美丽
[01:36.52]//
[01:38.36]//
[01:40.70]昨晚我长途跋涉 可我们哪儿也没去
[01:44.07]哪儿也没去
[01:45.75]半路上 我看见你炯炯有神的双眸 充满期待
[01:49.93]整夜
[01:50.99]我不再害怕镁光灯和闪烁不停的相机
[01:55.81]有你陪着我 我毫不在意
[01:59.68]我们格格不入 我们只想做自己
[02:04.85]我急需帮助 想结束这场对话
[02:10.05]你的容颜震惊四座 亲爱的 别着急地质问我
[02:15.13]我只是害怕 我们会变成
[02:18.56]//
[02:19.31]外表光鲜的名流 金玉其外实则败絮其中
[02:20.46]豪车云集 名牌衣服让人眼花缭乱
[02:23.10]坐在前排观看时装秀
[02:25.36]寒暄几句 你从事什么工作 你认识哪些达官显贵
[02:28.23]置身于上流社会的社交场合
[02:30.89]纸醉金迷的生活
[02:33.35]签下婚前协议 保证自己婚姻破裂时的权益
[02:35.83]身边有很多朋友 可依然感到孤独寂寞
[02:38.50]让我们离开这场聚会
[02:39.84]//
[02:40.13]这不是我们的本来面目
[02:42.85]我们是谁
[02:44.97]我们只是普通人
[02:49.99]这不是我们的本来面目
[02:53.12]我们是谁
[02:55.16]我们只是普通人
[02:57.46]美丽
[02:59.32]//
[03:03.69]我们是谁
[03:05.58]我们只是普通人
